trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di enumerazione <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "GridViewColumnHeader".
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente “GridViewColumnHeader”.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, this method returns a <see langword="this" /> pointer; otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> è <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" /> oppure <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke" />, questo metodo restituisce un puntatore <see langword="this" />; in caso contrario questo metodo restituisce <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'elemento associato a questo peer di automazione contiene dati presentati all'utente.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato da <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be moved; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se è possibile spostare l'elemento. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be resized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento può essere ridimensionato. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can rotate; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se l'elemento può essere ruotato; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Absolute screen coordinates of the left side of the control.
trans-unit.target: Coordinate assolute dello schermo del lato sinistro del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Absolute screen coordinates of the top of the control.
trans-unit.target: Coordinate assolute dello schermo della parte superiore del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The new width of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Nuova larghezza della finestra, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: The new height of the window, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Nuova altezza della finestra, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The number of degrees to rotate the control.
trans-unit.target: Numero di gradi di rotazione del controllo.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta l'infrastruttura [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] e non deve essere usato direttamente dal codice.
